command: if [[ -z "${AIRFLOW_API_URL:-}" ]]; then port=$(awk '/^api-server:/{f=1} f&&/port:/{print $2;exit}' "${ASTRO_WORKING_DIR:-$PWD}/.astro/config.yaml" 2>/dev/null); [[ -z "$port" || "$port" -eq 0 ]] && port=$(awk '/^api-server:/{f=1} f&&/port:/{print $2;exit}' ~/.astro/config.yaml 2>/dev/null); [[ -z "$port" || "$port" -eq 0 ]] && port=8080; export AIRFLOW_API_URL="http://localhost:$port"; fi; exec uvx astro-airflow-mcp "$@"
